summary: This is an email from Jeffrey Epstein dated June 29, 2010, sent in response to a message from an unidentified recipient. The email footer contains a confidentiality notice claiming attorney-client privilege and identifies the information as the property of Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Email sender, subject of confidentiality notice
persons.context: He is the sender of the email, and the confidentiality notice at the bottom claims the communication is his property and may be attorney-client privileged.

events.title: Epstein sends email
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein sends an email responding to a message asking about his location and contact numbers.

keyFacts: The document is an email sent by Jeffrey Epstein on June 29, 2010.
The email footer contains a strong confidentiality notice claiming the communication may be attorney-client privileged and is the property of Jeffrey Epstein.
The email is a response to a message inquiring about Epstein's location and noting that his phone numbers are no longer working.
The document is marked as subject to a protective order covering specific paragraphs.
